amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce by 25% the amount appropriated or otherwise made available by the bill that is not required to be appropriated or otherwise made available by a provision of law.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in Part A of House Report 111-219 to reduce by 25% the amount appropriated or otherwise made available by the bill that is not required to be appropriated or otherwise made available by a provision of law.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stearns amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 152 - 279 (Roll no. 626).
